content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
As New York fire fighter and National Guardsman Tom Riley, you're about to come face to face with the brutal Chimeran invasion force in this blistering shooter built from the ground up for the PlayStation®Vita. The latest installment in the hugely successful franchise focuses on the initial days of the assault by overwhelming Chimeran forces on the U.S. eastern seaboard and intense multiplayer.

Key Features:
• First fully portable, true FPS experience only available on the PS Vita system: dual analog sticks provide precision aiming and navigation, front touch screen functionality allows for easy to use primary and secondary weapon fire
• Hallmark Resistance experience that stays true to the franchise with classic Chimeran enemies, trademark weapon wheel, and a robust multiplayer experience
• Increased level of weapon customization, with returning favorites as well as all new weapons - all with a PS Vita system twist
• Engaging single-player campaign and fully competitive multiplayer experience across 6 maps and 3 modes.

Online Pass code may be redeemed once and becomes associated with the PlayStation®Network account used to redeem it. Online Pass access rights cannot be transferred once the voucher is redeemed. Online Pass codes cannot be returned for cash or credit.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time fee for downloads to up to two systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Resistance: Burning Skies™
